verbs.description: [ARG0: The Justice Department] [ARGM-MNR: formally] [V: notified] [ARG1: Congress] [ARGM-TMP: Thursday] [ARG2: that it was providing lawmakers copies of the explosive memos authored by former FBI Director James Comey about his encounters with President Trump] .

The Justice Department formally notified Congress Thursday that it [V: was] providing lawmakers copies of the explosive memos authored by former FBI Director James Comey about his encounters with President Trump .

The Justice Department formally notified Congress Thursday that [ARG0: it] was [V: providing] [ARG2: lawmakers] [ARG1: copies of the explosive memos authored by former FBI Director James Comey about his encounters with President Trump] .

The Justice Department formally notified Congress Thursday that it was providing lawmakers copies of [ARG1: the explosive memos] [V: authored] [ARG0: by former FBI Director James Comey] about his encounters with President Trump .
